content: --यक्ष्मः, --यक्ष्मन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} ‘consumption of the moon’, pulmonary consumption, consumption in general; राजयक्ष्मपरिहानिराययौ कामयानसमवस्थया तुलां <ls>R. 19. 50</ls>; राजयक्ष्मेव रोगाणां समूहः स महीभृतां <ls>Śi. 2. 96</ls>; (for explanation of the word see <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon, as well as on <ls>Śi. 13. 29</ls>).
